sentences.sContent: ...I can definitely remember what I learned on certain days at school...
...When you can quote a specific number like a fifth of the patients were able to quit...
...Viewing the past in high definition can make it very difficult to get over pain and regret...
...I can leave your bags with the porter...
...A handful of people can recall almost every day of their lives in enormous detail—and after years of research...
...their memories are highly self-centered: although they can remember “autobiographical” life events in extraordinary detail...
...HSAM can be both a curse and a blessing...
...you can use it not only in the class but also for the postgraduate entrance examination...
...And he can load them onto the shuttle for you when it arrives...

phrases.pCn: 正如你所看到的；你是知道的
禁不住，忍不住；情不自禁
是的，我们可以（奥巴马竞选口号）
棉条桶；纸板桶；纤维罐；纤维板桶
需要，希望得到；能对付，将就

trans.tranOther: a special metal container that keeps the liquid inside it under pressure. The liquid is released as a  spray  when you press the button
